title: DCC_SvcAppHook (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PUBLIC FINAL DCC_SvcAppHook EXTENDS BACnet.BACnetServerPluginBase IMPLEMENTS BACnet.IBACnetEventConsumer
Default implementation for DeviceCommunicationControl service application hook
Needs to be called cyclically to ensure DCC restauration after timed DCC request.
Properties:
Name
NumHooks
Password
Structure:
Name (Property)
NumHooks (Property)
Password (Property)
